group_1.textRight: You're finally awake!
Chairman, you're getting old.@Please don't overwork yourself.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...my memory is fuzzy...

group_1.textRight: San and Miyuri said you collapsed and@they brought you here.
You two went through a lot of trouble carrying@such a heavy old man all this way.
It wasn't particularly difficult, I train my body@on a regular basis.
More importantly, chairman,@are you feeling all right...?
Perhaps I should have called an ambulance...

group_1.textLeft: No, nothing's wrong. I'm feeling fine.

group_1.textRight: Are you sure...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, maybe I'll visit the hospital after@the festival is over.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that would be best.
I'm really, really glad you're okay.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, both of you.

group_1.textRight: Okay, chairman, there's a pile of work@waiting for you.

group_1.textLeft: You're a demon! Making someone who just@collapsed do work...

group_1.textRight: You say that, but aren't you getting up anyways?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I guess so. Gahaha...
...Phew.
In the end, the chairman was on the verge of@being attacked by a Familiar.
We failed to solve the problem at its roots...

group_1.textRight: Let's look for the Witch.
Maybe we can find it now by following its@magical signature.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed...
The Familiar's reaction was cut off here...
The dangerous Witch we fought together with@the others seems to have been hiding here...
I wonder what's going on here...

group_1.textRight: But, I feel like we're getting closer to the Witch.
Let's smash it so it doesn't interfere with@the festival!

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.
It's only a matter of time before we find it.@Let's get rid of the source of our troubles.
Hm...? The magic response is gone...?

group_1.textRight: Did it escape?!
But, the Familiar's response is gone too...

group_1.textLeft: Someone may have defeated it.

group_1.textRight: I see, I see...
Then it's nice that they saved us the time and effort.
Lady San, let's get back to the community center@and help everyone out!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's.

group_1.textRight: Is there something else?

group_1.textLeft: Say, Miyu...
Back then, were there six of us who fought@the Witch...?

group_1.textRight: Um, yes.

group_1.textLeft: At that time, I recall thinking Miyabi and Azumi@had changed, and were much more proactive...
But, I felt like there was another girl who@caught my interest...
It's from Her Highness...

group_1.textRight: She also wants me to follow an account...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Somewhere, in Takarazaki...this girl is active...
...For now, I think I'll ask Azumi...
See you later, Shigure.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, see you tomorrow, Hagumun.

group_1.textLeft: Are you still thinking about that account...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Somehow, I feel like this person@encouraged me...
Or rather, I got courage from watching her...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe you followed her a long time ago@or something...?

group_1.textRight: Doesn't it sort of bother you, Hagumun...?

group_1.textLeft: ...A little bit, yeah.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah, I knew it, I know this girl...
(You can't see my face, but I'm sure that's me@in the photo...)
I feel like we made some sort of promise...
